snippet.title: 『Chloé's Requiem -encore-』PV
snippet.description:
Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2320500

Michel, a gifted young violinist, arrives at an old manor.
When he enters the manor, there is a mysterious girl called Chloe.
Under the curse of the manor, the memories of the two are intertwined and the past of the two characters are gradually revealed.

What dark secrets will be revealed once the curse is fully broken?

Chloé's Requiem -encore- is a 2D exploration horror game with classical sounds and cute characters.
The game was released in 2013, and was remade with all-new graphics and sound effects.
